name: Ringside Wrestling
overview: Ringside Wrestling is a 1-player wrestling game for the VIC-20. Two wrestlers are stationary in the center of the ring, and can thrown a number of moves including: head kick, knee lift, body slam, airplane spin, suplex, atomic drop, and pile driver. After sufficiently damaging their opponent, they can go for the cover-up and win the match by reaching a count of 3. This is the only known wrestling game on the VIC-20.
